name: Stonk Market Simulator
description:
Write tweets, make money. The best stonkbrokers know the secret to making money on the stonkmarket is all in the tweets.

How to play

Type the tweets exactly as they appear on the screen. The faster you type, the more profit you'll make!

  • Keep your combo going by typing quickly without making any mistakes.
  • Making a mistake resets your combo.
  • You have 45 seconds to type as many tweets as you can!
Attribution
  • Thanks to Nick Preheim for all of the art used in the game. Be sure to check out his other work!
  • Thanks to @elonmusk and r/wallstreetbets for tweets and inspiration.
